text: Harry Styles is the debut solo studio album by English singer and songwriter Harry Styles. The album was released on 12 May 2017, through Erskine and Columbia Records. In support of the album, Styles embarked on his first headlining concert tour, Harry Styles: Live on Tour. The album focused on women and relationships. The album had positive reviews from critics. ==References== Category:2017 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Harry Styles
title: Harry Styles (album)
